00028 struct FFTAxis {
00029     const char *desc;
00030     int h,k,l;
00031     int h0,k0,l0;
00032 };
00033 static const FFTAxis c_fftaxes[] = {
00034     {"h 0 0", 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0},
00035     {"0 k 0", 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0},
00036     {"0 0 l", 0, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0},
00037     {"h h 0", 1, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0},
00038     {"h h h", 1, 1, 1, 0, 0, 0},
00039     {0, 0,0,0, 0,0,0}
00040 };
00041 #define GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_ABS "FFT3D-abs."
00042 #define GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_X "FFT3D-x"
00043 #define GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Y "FFT3D-y"
00044 #define GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Z "FFT3D-z"
00045 #define GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_M "FFT3D-along-H"
00046 #define GRAPH_REAL_M "SPINS-along-H"
00047 #define GRAPH_REAL_H "H-along-Ising"
00048 #define GRAPH_REAL_P "Flipping Probability"
00049 #define GRAPH_REAL_H_B_SITE "H-at-B-site"
00050 #define GRAPH_REAL_H_8a_SITE "H-at-8a-site"
00051 #define GRAPH_REAL_H_48f_SITE "H-at-48f-site"

00053 XMonteCarloDriver::XMonteCarloDriver(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00054                                      const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00055                                      const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00056                                      const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00057                                      const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00058     XDummyDriver<XPrimaryDriver>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers),
00059     m_targetTemp(create<XDoubleNode>("TargetTemp", false)),
00060     m_targetField(create<XDoubleNode>("TargetField", false)),
00061     m_hdirx(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldDirX", false)),
00062     m_hdiry(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldDirY", false)),
00063     m_hdirz(create<XDoubleNode>("FieldDirZ", false)),
00064     m_L(create<XUIntNode>("Length", false)),
00065     m_cutoffReal(create<XDoubleNode>("CutoffReal", false)),
00066     m_cutoffRec(create<XDoubleNode>("CutoffRec", false)),
00067     m_alpha(create<XDoubleNode>("Alpha", false)),
00068     m_minTests(create<XDoubleNode>("MinTests", false)),
00069     m_minFlips(create<XDoubleNode>("MinFlips", false)),
00070     m_step(create<XNode>("Step", true)),
00071     m_graph3D(create<XComboNode>("Graph3D", false, true)),
00072     m_entryT(create<XScalarEntry>("Temp", false, 
00073                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.6g")),
00074     m_entryH(create<XScalarEntry>("Field", false,
00075                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.6g")),
00076     m_entryU(create<XScalarEntry>("U", false,
00077                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.6g")),
00078     m_entryC(create<XScalarEntry>("C", false,
00079                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.4g")),
00080     m_entryCoT(create<XScalarEntry>("CoverT", false,
00081                                     dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.4g")),
00082     m_entryS(create<XScalarEntry>("S", false,
00083                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.6g")),
00084     m_entryM(create<XScalarEntry>("M", false,
00085                                   dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.6g")),
00086     m_entry2in2(create<XScalarEntry>("2in2", false,
00087                                      dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.4g")),
00088     m_entry1in3(create<XScalarEntry>("1in3", false,
00089                                      dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()), "%.4g")),
00090     m_form(new FrmMonteCarlo(g_pFrmMain)),
00091     m_wave3D(create<XWaveNGraph>("Wave3D", false, 
00092                                  m_form->m_graph, m_form->m_urlDump, m_form->m_btnDump)),
00093     m_statusPrinter(XStatusPrinter::create(m_form.get())),
00094     m_fftlen(-1)
00095 {
00096     scalarentries->insert(m_entryT);
00097     scalarentries->insert(m_entryH);
00098     scalarentries->insert(m_entryU);
00099     scalarentries->insert(m_entryC);
00100     scalarentries->insert(m_entryCoT);
00101     scalarentries->insert(m_entryS);
00102     scalarentries->insert(m_entryM);
00103     scalarentries->insert(m_entry2in2);
00104     scalarentries->insert(m_entry1in3);
00105     m_targetTemp->value(100.0);
00106     m_hdirx->value(1.0);
00107     m_hdiry->value(1.0);
00108     m_hdirz->value(1.0);
00109     m_L->value(8);
00110     m_cutoffReal->value(4.0);
00111     m_cutoffRec->value(2.0);
00112     m_alpha->value(0.5);
00113     m_minTests->value(1.0);
00114     m_minFlips->value(0.2);
00115   
00116 //  for(const FFTAxis *axis = c_fftaxes; axis->desc; axis++) {
00117 //    m_fftAxisX->add(axis->desc);
00118 //    m_fftAxisY->add(axis->desc);
00119 //  }
00120 //  m_fftAxisX->value(0);
00121 //  m_fftAxisY->value(1);
00122   
00123     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_ABS);
00124     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_X);
00125     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Y);
00126     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Z);
00127     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_M);
00128     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_M);
00129     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_H);
00130     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_P);
00131     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_H_B_SITE);
00132     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_H_8a_SITE);
00133     m_graph3D->add(GRAPH_REAL_H_48f_SITE);
00134   
00135     m_conLength = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_L, m_form->m_edLength);
00136     m_conCutoffReal = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_cutoffReal, m_form->m_edCutoffReal);
00137     m_conCutoffRec = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_cutoffRec, m_form->m_edCutoffRec);
00138     m_conAlpha = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_alpha, m_form->m_edAlpha);
00139     m_conTargetTemp = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_targetTemp, m_form->m_edTargetTemp);
00140     m_conTargetField = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_targetField, m_form->m_edTargetField);
00141     m_conHDirX = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_hdirx, m_form->m_edHDirX);
00142     m_conHDirY = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_hdiry, m_form->m_edHDirY);
00143     m_conHDirZ = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_hdirz, m_form->m_edHDirZ);
00144     m_conMinTests = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_minTests, m_form->m_edMinTests);
00145     m_conMinFlips = xqcon_create<XQLineEditConnector>(m_minFlips, m_form->m_edMinFlips);
00146     m_conStep = xqcon_create<XQButtonConnector>(m_step, m_form->m_btnStep);
00147     m_conGraph3D = xqcon_create<XQComboBoxConnector>(m_graph3D, m_form->m_cmbGraph3D);
00148 
00149     m_L->setUIEnabled(true);
00150     m_cutoffReal->setUIEnabled(true);
00151     m_hdirx->setUIEnabled(true);
00152     m_hdiry->setUIEnabled(true);
00153     m_hdirz->setUIEnabled(true);
00154     m_minTests->setUIEnabled(true);
00155     m_minFlips->setUIEnabled(true);
00156     m_step->setUIEnabled(true);
00157     m_targetTemp->setUIEnabled(true);
00158     m_targetField->setUIEnabled(true);
00159 
00160     const char *s_trace_names[] = {
00161         "h or x", "k or y", "l or z", "intens.", "hx", "hy", "hz", "site"
00162     };
00163     m_wave3D->setColCount(8, s_trace_names); 
00164     m_wave3D->insertPlot("Intens.", 0, 1, -1, 3, 2);
00165     m_wave3D->clear();
00166     m_wave3D->plot(0)->drawLines()->value(false);
00167 
00168     m_wave3D->graph()->backGround()->value(QColor(0,0,0).rgb());
00169     m_wave3D->plot(0)->intensity()->value(2);
00170     m_wave3D->plot(0)->colorPlot()->value(true);
00171     m_wave3D->plot(0)->colorPlotColorHigh()->value(QColor(0xFF, 0xFF, 0x2F).rgb());
00172     m_wave3D->plot(0)->colorPlotColorLow()->value(QColor(0x00, 0x00, 0xFF).rgb());
00173     m_wave3D->plot(0)->pointColor()->value(QColor(0x00, 0xFF, 0x00).rgb());
00174     m_wave3D->plot(0)->majorGridColor()->value(QColor(0x4A, 0x4A, 0x4A).rgb());
00175     m_wave3D->graph()->titleColor()->value(clWhite);
00176     m_wave3D->axisx()->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00177     m_wave3D->axisx()->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00178     m_wave3D->axisx()->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00179     m_wave3D->axisy()->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00180     m_wave3D->axisy()->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00181     m_wave3D->axisy()->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00182     m_wave3D->axisz()->ticColor()->value(clWhite);
00183     m_wave3D->axisz()->labelColor()->value(clWhite);
00184     m_wave3D->axisz()->ticLabelColor()->value(clWhite);  
00185 }
00186 XMonteCarloDriver::~XMonteCarloDriver() {
00187     for(int d = 0; d < 3; d++) {
00188         if(m_fftlen > 0) {
00189             fftw_destroy_plan(m_fftplan[d]);
00190             fftw_free(m_pFFTin[d]);
00191             fftw_free(m_pFFTout[d]);
00192         }
00193     }   
00194 }
00195 void
00196 XMonteCarloDriver::showForms() {
00197 //! impliment form->show() here
00198     m_form->show();
00199     m_form->raise();
00200 }
00201 void
00202 XMonteCarloDriver::start()
00203 {
00204     MonteCarlo::setupField(*m_L, 0.0, *m_cutoffReal, *m_cutoffRec, *m_alpha);
00205     m_L->setUIEnabled(false);
00206     m_loop.reset(new MonteCarlo(2));
00207     m_store.reset(new MonteCarlo(1));
00208     m_cutoffReal->setUIEnabled(false);
00209     m_cutoffRec->setUIEnabled(false);
00210     m_alpha->setUIEnabled(false);
00211     m_sumDU = m_loop->internalEnergy() * N_A;
00212     m_sumDUav = m_sumDU;
00213     m_sumDS = 0.0;
00214     m_testsTotal = 0.0;
00215     m_flippedTotal = 0.0;
00216     m_lastTemp = 300.0;
00217     m_lastField = 0.0;
00218     m_dU = 0.0;
00219     m_hdirx->setUIEnabled(false);
00220     m_hdiry->setUIEnabled(false);
00221     m_hdirz->setUIEnabled(false);
00222     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field_dir(*m_hdirx,*m_hdiry,*m_hdirz);
00223     field_dir.normalize();
00224     m_lastMagnetization = m_loop->magnetization().innerProduct(field_dir);
00225 
00226     m_lsnTargetChanged = m_targetTemp->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00227         shared_from_this(), &XMonteCarloDriver::onTargetChanged);
00228     m_targetField->onValueChanged().connect(m_lsnTargetChanged);
00229     m_lsnStepTouched = m_step->onTouch().connectWeak(
00230         shared_from_this(), &XMonteCarloDriver::onStepTouched);
00231     m_lsnGraphChanged = m_graph3D->onValueChanged().connectWeak(
00232         shared_from_this(), &XMonteCarloDriver::onGraphChanged);
00233 
00234     int fftlen = MonteCarlo::length() * 4;
00235     for(int d = 0; d < 3; d++) {
00236         if(m_fftlen > 0) {
00237             fftw_destroy_plan(m_fftplan[d]);
00238             fftw_free(m_pFFTin[d]);
00239             fftw_free(m_pFFTout[d]);
00240         }
00241         m_pFFTin[d] = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * fftlen * fftlen * fftlen);
00242         m_pFFTout[d] = (fftw_complex*)fftw_malloc(sizeof(fftw_complex) * fftlen * fftlen * fftlen);
00243         m_fftplan[d] = fftw_plan_dft_3d(fftlen, fftlen, fftlen, m_pFFTin[d], m_pFFTout[d],
00244             FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00245     }
00246     m_fftlen = fftlen;
00247 }
00248 void
00249 XMonteCarloDriver::stop()
00250 {
00251     m_lsnTargetChanged.reset();
00252     m_lsnStepTouched.reset();
00253     m_lsnGraphChanged.reset();
00254     MonteCarlo::s_bAborting = true;
00255     m_L->setUIEnabled(true);
00256     m_cutoffReal->setUIEnabled(true);
00257     m_cutoffRec->setUIEnabled(true);
00258     m_alpha->setUIEnabled(true);
00259     m_hdirx->setUIEnabled(true);
00260     m_hdiry->setUIEnabled(true);
00261     m_hdirz->setUIEnabled(true);
00262     
00263     afterStop();
00264 }
00265 void
00266 XMonteCarloDriver::analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&)
00267 {
00268     unsigned int size = MonteCarlo::length();
00269     if(rawData().size() != size*size*size*16)
00270         throw XRecordError("Size Mismatch", __FILE__, __LINE__);
00271     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field_dir(*m_hdirx,*m_hdiry,*m_hdirz);
00272     field_dir.normalize();
00273     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field(field_dir);
00274     field *= *m_targetField;
00275     char *spins = (char*)&rawData()[0];
00276     m_store->read(spins, *m_targetTemp, field);
00277 
00278     double dT = *m_targetTemp - m_lastTemp;
00279     m_lastTemp = *m_targetTemp;
00280     double m = m_store->magnetization().innerProduct(field_dir);
00281     double dM = m - m_lastMagnetization;
00282     double dH = *m_targetField - m_lastField;
00283     double dU = m_dU;
00284     // DS += (DU + HDM + MDH)/T
00285     m_sumDS += (dU + dM * *m_targetField * MU_B * N_A) / *m_targetTemp; 
00286     // DU += -MDH.
00287     dU += -m_lastMagnetization * MU_B * N_A * dH;
00288     double dUav = m_DUav * N_A;
00289     dUav += -m_Mav * MU_B * N_A * dH;
00290     double c = (fabs(dT) < 1e-10) ? 0.0 : ((m_sumDU + dUav - m_sumDUav) / dT);
00291     m_sumDUav = m_sumDU + dUav;
00292     m_sumDU += dU;
00293     m_lastMagnetization = m;
00294     m_lastField = *m_targetField;
00295     double u = m_sumDU;
00296     if(rand() % 20 == 0) {
00297         std::cerr << "Recalculate Internal Energy." << std::endl;
00298         u = m_store->internalEnergy() * N_A;
00299         if(fabs((u - m_sumDU)/u) > 1e-5) {
00300             gErrPrint(formatString("SumDU Error = %g!", (double)(u - m_sumDU)/u)); 
00301         }
00302     }
00303     MonteCarlo::Quartet quartet = m_store->siteMagnetization();
00304     m_entryT->value(m_lastTemp);
00305     m_entryH->value(m_lastField);
00306     m_entryU->value(u);
00307     m_entryC->value(c);
00308     m_entryCoT->value(c / m_lastTemp);
00309     m_entryS->value(m_sumDS);
00310     m_entryM->value(m_Mav);
00311     m_entry2in2->value(100.0*quartet.twotwo);
00312     m_entry1in3->value(100.0*quartet.onethree);
00313 }
00314 void
00315 XMonteCarloDriver::visualize()
00316 {
00317     //! impliment extra codes which do not need write-lock of record
00318     //! record is read-locked
00319     if(!time()) {
00320         m_wave3D->clear();
00321         return;
00322     }
00323     
00324     bool fftx = false;
00325     bool ffty = false;
00326     bool fftz = false;
00327     bool fft_intens_abs = false;
00328     bool along_field_dir = false;
00329     bool calch = false;
00330     bool calcp = false;
00331     bool calcasite = false;
00332     bool calcbsite = false;
00333     bool calc8asite = false;
00334     bool calc48fsite = false;
00335     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_ABS) {
00336         fftx = true;
00337         ffty = true;
00338         fftz = true;
00339         fft_intens_abs = true;
00340     }
00341     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_X) {
00342         fftx = true;
00343     }
00344     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Y) {
00345         ffty = true;
00346     }
00347     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_Z) {
00348         fftz = true;
00349     }
00350     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_3D_FFT_INTENS_M) {
00351         fftx = true;
00352         ffty = true;
00353         fftz = true;
00354         along_field_dir = true;
00355     }
00356     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_M) {
00357         calcasite = true;
00358         along_field_dir = true;
00359     }
00360     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_H) {
00361         calcasite = true;
00362         calch = true;
00363     }
00364     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_P) {
00365         calcasite = true;
00366         calch = true;
00367         calcp = true;
00368     }
00369     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_H_B_SITE) {
00370         calcbsite = true;
00371     }
00372     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_H_8a_SITE) {
00373         calc8asite = true;
00374     }
00375     if(m_graph3D->to_str() == GRAPH_REAL_H_48f_SITE) {
00376         calc48fsite = true;
00377     }
00378 
00379     int size = m_store->length();
00380     std::vector<char> spins(size*size*size*16);
00381     std::vector<double> fields;
00382     if(calch) fields.resize(size*size*size*16);
00383     std::vector<double> probabilities;
00384     if(calcp) probabilities.resize(size*size*size*16);
00385     m_store->write((char*)&spins[0]
00386                    , fields.size() ? &fields[0] : 0, probabilities.size() ? &probabilities[0] : 0);
00387     for(int d = 0; d < 3; d++) {
00388         for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00389             const int *pos = cg_ASitePositions[site];
00390             int ising = cg_ASiteIsingAxes[site][d];
00391             for(int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
00392                 for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
00393                     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00394                         int fftidx = m_fftlen*(m_fftlen*(4*k+pos[2]) + 4*j+pos[1]) + 4*i + pos[0];
00395                         int spin = spins[size*(size*(size*site + k) + j) + i];
00396                         m_pFFTin[d][fftidx][0] = spin* ising / sqrt(3.0);
00397                     }
00398                 }
00399             }
00400         }
00401     }
00402     
00403     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field_dir(*m_hdirx,*m_hdiry,*m_hdirz);
00404     field_dir.normalize();
00405     
00406 
00407     if(fftx || ffty || fftz)
00408     {
00409         fftw_execute(m_fftplan[0]);
00410         fftw_execute(m_fftplan[1]);
00411         fftw_execute(m_fftplan[2]);
00412     
00413         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave3D);
00414         m_wave3D->setRowCount(m_fftlen * m_fftlen * m_fftlen );
00415         double normalize = A_MOMENT / m_fftlen / m_fftlen / m_fftlen;
00416         int idx = 0;
00417         for(int l = 0; l < m_fftlen; l++) {
00418             for(int k = 0; k < m_fftlen; k++) {
00419                 for(int h = 0; h < m_fftlen; h++) {
00420                     int qidx = m_fftlen*(m_fftlen*l + k) + h;
00421                     fftw_complex *ix = &m_pFFTout[0][qidx];
00422                     fftw_complex *iy = &m_pFFTout[1][qidx];
00423                     fftw_complex *iz = &m_pFFTout[2][qidx];
00424                     m_wave3D->cols(0)[idx] = (double)h * 8.0/m_fftlen;
00425                     m_wave3D->cols(1)[idx] = (double)k * 8.0/m_fftlen;
00426                     m_wave3D->cols(2)[idx] = (double)l * 8.0/m_fftlen;
00427                     double v = 0.0;
00428                     if(along_field_dir) {
00429                         double vr = field_dir.innerProduct(MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00430                                                            ((*ix)[0], (*iy)[0], (*iz)[0]));
00431                         double vi = field_dir.innerProduct(MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00432                                                            ((*ix)[1], (*iy)[1], (*iz)[1]));
00433                         v = vr*vr + vi * vi;
00434                     }
00435                     else {
00436                         if(fftx) v+= (*ix)[0]*(*ix)[0] + (*ix)[1]*(*ix)[1];
00437                         if(ffty) v+= (*iy)[0]*(*iy)[0] + (*iy)[1]*(*iy)[1];
00438                         if(fftz) v+= (*iz)[0]*(*iz)[0] + (*iz)[1]*(*iz)[1];
00439                     }
00440                     v = sqrt(v);
00441                     m_wave3D->cols(3)[idx] = v * normalize;
00442                     m_wave3D->cols(4)[idx] = ((*ix)[0]*(*ix)[0] + (*ix)[1]*(*ix)[1]) * normalize;
00443                     m_wave3D->cols(5)[idx] = ((*iy)[0]*(*iy)[0] + (*iy)[1]*(*iy)[1]) * normalize;
00444                     m_wave3D->cols(6)[idx] = ((*iz)[0]*(*iz)[0] + (*iz)[1]*(*iz)[1]) * normalize;
00445                     m_wave3D->cols(7)[idx] = 0;
00446                     idx++;
00447                 }
00448             }
00449         }
00450     }
00451     if(calcasite)
00452     {   XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave3D);
00453     int idx = 0;
00454     m_wave3D->setRowCount(16*size*size*size);
00455     for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00456         const int *pos = cg_ASitePositions[site];
00457         for(int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
00458             for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
00459                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00460                     int sidx = size*(size*(size*site + k) + j) + i;
00461                     int fftidx = m_fftlen*(m_fftlen*(4*k+pos[2]) + 4*j+pos[1]) + 4*i + pos[0];
00462                     double x = i + pos[0] * 0.25;
00463                     double y = j + pos[1] * 0.25;
00464                     double z = k + pos[2] * 0.25;
00465                     m_wave3D->cols(0)[idx] = x;
00466                     m_wave3D->cols(1)[idx] = y;
00467                     m_wave3D->cols(2)[idx] = z;
00468                     double sx = m_pFFTin[0][fftidx][0];
00469                     double sy = m_pFFTin[1][fftidx][0];
00470                     double sz = m_pFFTin[2][fftidx][0];
00471                     double v = 0.0;
00472                     if(along_field_dir) {
00473                         v = field_dir.innerProduct(MonteCarlo::Vector3<double>
00474                                                    (sx,sy,sz)) * A_MOMENT;
00475                     }
00476                     else {
00477                         if(calcp) {
00478                             v = probabilities[sidx];
00479                         }
00480                         else {
00481                             if(calch) {
00482                                 v = fields[sidx];
00483                             }
00484                         }
00485                     }
00486                     m_wave3D->cols(3)[idx] = v;
00487                     m_wave3D->cols(4)[idx] = sx;
00488                     m_wave3D->cols(5)[idx] = sy;
00489                     m_wave3D->cols(6)[idx] = sz;
00490                     m_wave3D->cols(7)[idx] = site;
00491                     idx++;
00492                 }
00493             }
00494         }
00495     }
00496     }
00497     if(calcbsite)
00498     {
00499         std::vector<MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> > fields(16*size*size*size);
00500         m_store->write_bsite(&fields[0]);
00501         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave3D);
00502         int idx = 0;
00503         m_wave3D->setRowCount(16*size*size*size);
00504         for(int site = 0; site < 16; site++) {
00505             const int *pos = cg_BSitePositions[site];
00506             for(int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
00507                 for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
00508                     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00509                         int sidx = size*(size*(size*site + k) + j) + i;
00510                         MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> h(fields[sidx]);
00511                         double x = i + pos[0] * 0.25;
00512                         double y = j + pos[1] * 0.25;
00513                         double z = k + pos[2] * 0.25;
00514                         m_wave3D->cols(0)[idx] = x;
00515                         m_wave3D->cols(1)[idx] = y;
00516                         m_wave3D->cols(2)[idx] = z;
00517                         m_wave3D->cols(3)[idx] = h.abs();
00518                         m_wave3D->cols(4)[idx] = h.x;
00519                         m_wave3D->cols(5)[idx] = h.y;
00520                         m_wave3D->cols(6)[idx] = h.z;
00521                         m_wave3D->cols(7)[idx] = site;
00522                         idx++;
00523                     }
00524                 }
00525             }
00526         }
00527     }
00528     if(calc8asite)
00529     {
00530         std::vector<MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> > fields(8*size*size*size);
00531         m_store->write_8asite(&fields[0]);
00532         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave3D);
00533         int idx = 0;
00534         m_wave3D->setRowCount(8*size*size*size);
00535         for(int site = 0; site < 8; site++) {
00536             const int *pos = cg_8aSitePositions[site];
00537             for(int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
00538                 for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
00539                     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00540                         int sidx = size*(size*(size*site + k) + j) + i;
00541                         MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> h(fields[sidx]);
00542                         double x = i + pos[0] * 0.125;
00543                         double y = j + pos[1] * 0.125;
00544                         double z = k + pos[2] * 0.125;
00545                         m_wave3D->cols(0)[idx] = x;
00546                         m_wave3D->cols(1)[idx] = y;
00547                         m_wave3D->cols(2)[idx] = z;
00548                         m_wave3D->cols(3)[idx] = h.abs();
00549                         m_wave3D->cols(4)[idx] = h.x;
00550                         m_wave3D->cols(5)[idx] = h.y;
00551                         m_wave3D->cols(6)[idx] = h.z;
00552                         m_wave3D->cols(7)[idx] = site;
00553                         idx++;
00554                     }
00555                 }
00556             }
00557         }
00558     }
00559     if(calc48fsite)
00560     {
00561         std::vector<MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> > fields(48*size*size*size);
00562         m_store->write_48fsite(&fields[0]);
00563         XScopedWriteLock<XWaveNGraph> lock(*m_wave3D);
00564         int idx = 0;
00565         m_wave3D->setRowCount(48*size*size*size);
00566         for(int site = 0; site < 48; site++) {
00567             const double *pos = cg_48fSitePositions[site];
00568             for(int k = 0; k < size; k++) {
00569                 for(int j = 0; j < size; j++) {
00570                     for(int i = 0; i < size; i++) {
00571                         int sidx = size*(size*(size*site + k) + j) + i;
00572                         MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> h(fields[sidx]);
00573                         double x = i + pos[0] * 0.125;
00574                         double y = j + pos[1] * 0.125;
00575                         double z = k + pos[2] * 0.125;
00576                         m_wave3D->cols(0)[idx] = x;
00577                         m_wave3D->cols(1)[idx] = y;
00578                         m_wave3D->cols(2)[idx] = z;
00579                         m_wave3D->cols(3)[idx] = h.abs();
00580                         m_wave3D->cols(4)[idx] = h.x;
00581                         m_wave3D->cols(5)[idx] = h.y;
00582                         m_wave3D->cols(6)[idx] = h.z;
00583                         m_wave3D->cols(7)[idx] = site;
00584                         idx++;
00585                     }
00586                 }
00587             }
00588         }
00589     }
00590 }
00591 void
00592 XMonteCarloDriver::onGraphChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00593 {
00594     readLockRecord();
00595     visualize();
00596     readUnlockRecord();
00597   
00598 }
00599 void
00600 XMonteCarloDriver::onTargetChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &)
00601 {
00602     int size = m_loop->length();
00603     int spin_size = size*size*size*4*4;
00604     int flips = (int)(*m_minFlips * spin_size);
00605     long double tests = *m_minTests * spin_size;
00606     execute(flips, tests);
00607 }
00608 void
00609 XMonteCarloDriver::onStepTouched(const shared_ptr<XNode> &)
00610 {
00611     execute(1, 1);
00612 }
00613 void
00614 XMonteCarloDriver::execute(int flips, long double tests)
00615 {
00616     unsigned int size = m_loop->length();
00617     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field_dir(*m_hdirx,*m_hdiry,*m_hdirz);
00618     field_dir.normalize();
00619     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> field(field_dir);
00620     field *= *m_targetField;
00621     MonteCarlo::Vector3<double> m;
00622     m_dU = m_loop->exec(*m_targetTemp, field, &flips, &tests, &m_DUav, &m) * N_A;
00623     m_testsTotal += tests;
00624     m_flippedTotal += flips;
00625     m_Mav = m.innerProduct(field_dir);
00626     rawData().resize(size*size*size*16);
00627     m_loop->write((char*)&rawData()[0]);
00628     finishWritingRaw(XTime::now(), XTime::now());
00629 }
